fxwindow.fxtoolbar

Class FXToolbar

  • java.lang.Object
    • fxwindow.fxtoolbar.FXToolbar

  • public class FXToolbar
extends java.lang.Object

    This class allow to manage basic actions for window

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ivan Zhen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FXToolbar()
      Creates empty FXToolbar object
      FXToolbar(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root)
      Creates FXToolbar object with root element of stage
      FXToolbar(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root, javafx.scene.image.Image minimizeIcon, javafx.scene.image.Image maximizeIcon)
      Creates FXToolbar object with root element of stage and icons for minimize and maximize

      • FXToolbar

        public FXToolbar(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root,
                 javafx.scene.image.Image minimizeIcon,
                 javafx.scene.image.Image maximizeIcon)
        Creates FXToolbar object with root element of stage and icons for minimize and maximize
        Parameters:
        root - Root element of the stage as AnchorPane
        minimizeIcon - Image for button when window is maximized
        maximizeIcon - Image for button when window is minimized

      • maximizeWindow

        public void maximizeWindow(FXResize fxresize,
                           javafx.scene.image.ImageView imgMaximize)
        Maximize or minimize window, disable or enable resizing, and manage maximize and minimize images for ImageView
        Parameters:
        fxresize - Object FXResize only if you are using resizing
        imgMaximize - ImageView for maximize and minimize button
